courses.name: Intro to JS : An introduction to Modern JavaScript
courses.description: If you’re learning to program for the first time, or if you’re coming from a different language, this course, JavaScript: Getting Started, will give you the basics for coding in JavaScript. First, you'll discover the types of applications that can be built with JavaScript, and the platforms they’ll run on.

bottomSection.title: Image Alignment
bottomSection.firstParagraph: Welcome to image alignment! The best way to demonstrate the ebb and flow of the various image positioning options is to nestle them snuggly among an ocean of words. Grab a paddle and let’s get started.
bottomSection.secondParagraph: The rest of this paragraph is filler for the sake of seeing the text wrap around the 150×150 image, which is left aligned.
bottomSection.secondParagraphText: As you can see the should be some space above, below, and to the right of the image. The text should not be creeping on the image. Creeping is just not right. Images need breathing room too.
bottomSection.thirdParagraph: Let them speak like you words. Let them do their jobs without any hassle from the text. In about one more sentence here, we’ll see that the text moves from the right of the image down below the image in seamless transition. Again, letting the do it’s thang. Mission accomplished!
bottomSection.thirdParagraphText: The rest of this paragraph is filler for the sake of seeing the text wrap around the 150×150 image, which is right aligned.
bottomSection.finalParagraph: And that’s a wrap, yo! You survived the tumultuous waters of alignment. Image alignment achievement unlocked!
